alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Custer; Lincoln; Logan; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 23 at 5:05AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN LINCOLN...LOGAN... WESTERN CUSTER...SOUTHWESTERN BLAINE AND SOUTHEASTERN THOMAS COUNTIES THROUGH 545 AM CDT... At 504 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles south of Thedford to 8 miles north of Stapleton to near Gandy to 9 miles northeast of North Platte Airport. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Stapleton, Arnold, Dunning, Gandy, Logan, Highway 83 crossing The Dismal River, Milldale, Linscott, Tarboz Lake, Shanklin Bluff, Pleasant Hill, Hoagland, Brown Lake, and Finchville. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 235 and 256. Highway 92 between mile markers 225 and 267. Highway 83 between mile markers 94 and 138. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
